QuestData.Title: Feasting on the Dragon
QuestData.Description: You killed their leader, so they came here? Understandable. These creatures crave only one thing - magic - and they can sniff it out from leagues away.$b$bWithout a leader, they will soon wither and die. Our only recourse in the meantime is to put as many as possible down before they take these dragons with them!
QuestData.RewardText: That will have to do for now.
